title: Step-by-Step Project-Based Education for Strengthening Population Health Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Establishing a real-time collaborative and data analysis environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design priority programs based on health needs assessments of specific populations
Learners can measure the effectiveness of health management programs by applying the CDC Program Evaluation Framework
Learners can create program outcome analysis reports based on real-world case data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
